Installation
============

Installing quickly with PyPI
----------------------------

Binary installers for the latest released version are available at the [Python Package Index (PyPI)](https://pypi.org/project/kern-rowduction) :

.. code-block:: shell

    pip install kern_rowduction

Installing with Github
----------------------

Clone the networkx repostitory

1. git clone https://github.com/kern-rowduction/kern-rowduction.git
(see https://github.com/kern-rowduction/kern-rowduction for other options)
2. Change directory to networkx
3. Run python setup.py install to build and install


Installing from source
----------------------

You can install from source by downloading a source archive file (tar.gz or zip) or by checking out the source files from the Github source code repository.

Kern-Rowduction is a pure Python package; you donâ€™t need a compiler to build or install it.
